sections.text: brahmaq saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | kShaqtra(gm) sandha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | iShaq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam | Urjaq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam | raqyi(gm) saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam | puShTiq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam | praqjA(gm) saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam | paqSUn thsaMdha#ttaqM tAnmE# jinvatam || stuqtO#&siq jana#dhAH | dEqvAstvA# SukraqpAH praNa#yantu || 1 (10)

suqvIrA$H praqjAH pra#jaqnayaqn parI#hi | SuqkraH SuqkraSO#ciShA || stuqtO#&siq jana#dhAH | dEqvAstvA# manthiqpAH praNa#yantu || suqpraqjAH praqjAH pra#jaqnayaqn parI#hi | maqnthI maqnthiSO#ciShA || saqjaMqgmAqnau diqva A pRu#thiqvyA&&yu#H | saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | prAqNa(gm) saMdha#ttaqM taM mE# jinvatam | aqpAqna(gm) saMdha#ttaqM taM mE# jinvatam | 2 (10)

vyAqna(gm) saMdha#ttaqM taM mE# jinvatam | cakShuqH saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | SrOtraq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | manaqH saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | vAcaq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam || Ayu#H sthaq Ayu#rmE dhattam | Ayu#r yaqj~jAya# dhattam | Ayu#r yaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | prAqNaH stha#H prAqNaM mE# dhattam | prAqNaM ~Myaqj~jAya# dhattam | 3 (10)

prAqNaM ~Myaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | cakShu#H sthaqScakShu#rmE dhattam | cakShu#r yaqj~jAya# dhattam | cakShu#r yaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | SrOtra(gg)# sthaqH SrOtra#M mE dhattam | SrOtra#M ~Myaqj~jAya# dhattam | SrOtra#M ~Myaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | tau dE#vau SukrAmanthinau | kaqlpaya#taqM daivIqrviSa#H | kaqlpaya#taqM mAnu#ShIH | 4 (10)

iShaq-mUrja#maqsmAsu# dhattam | prAqNAn paqSuShu# | praqjAM mayi# caq yaja#mAnE ca || nira#staqH SaNDa#H | nira#stOq marka#H || apa#nuttauq SaNDAqmarkau# saqhAmunA$ || Suqkrasya# saqmida#si | maqnthina#H saqmida#si || sa pra#thaqmaH saMkRu#tir viqSvaka#rmA | sa pra#thaqmO miqtrO varu#NO aqgniH ( ) | sa pra#thaqmO bRuhaqspati#ScikiqtvAn | tasmAq indrA#ya suqtamAju#hOmi || 5 (12) (naqyaq - ntvaqpAqna(gm) saMdha#ttaMq taM mE# jinvataM - prAqNaM ~Myaqj~jAya# dhattaMq - mAnu#ShIr - aqgnir dvE ca#) (A1) (SpEcial kOrvai fOr Anuvakam 1 ) brahma# kShaqtraM tat | iShaqmUrja(gm)# raqyiM puShTi#M praqjAM tAm | paqSun tAn | sandha#ttaqM tat | prAqNama#pAqnaM ~MvyAqnaM tam | cakShuqH SrOtraqM manaqstat | vAcaqM tAm | iqShAdiqpa~jca#kEq vAcaqM tAM mE$ | paqSUn thsaMdha#ttaqM tAnmE$ | prAqNAdiqtrita#yEq taM mE$ | aqnyatraq tanmE$ | ) 1.1.2 anuvAkaM 2 - athAgnyAdhAnaprakaraNaM, tatra kAlaviSEShavidhiH

kRutti#kA-svaqgni-mAda#dhIta | EqtadvA aqgnEr nakSha#tram | yat kRutti#kAH | svAyA#mEqvaina#M dEqvatA#yAmAqdhAya# | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsI Ba#vati || muKaqM ~MvA EqtannakSha#trANAm | yat kRutti#kAH | yaH kRutti#kA-svaqgni-mA#dhaqttE | muKya# Eqva Ba#vati || athOq Kalu# | 6 (10)

aqgniq-naqkShaqtramitya-pa#cAyanti | gRuqhAn.haq dAhu#kO Bavati || praqjApa#tI rOhiqNyA-maqgni-ma#sRujata | taM dEqvA rO#hiqNyA-mAda#dhata | tatOq vai tE sarvAqn rOhA#narOhann | tad-rO#hiqNyai rO#hiNiqtvam | yO rO#hiqNyA-maqgnimA#dhaqttE | RuqdhnOtyEqva | sarvAqn rOhA$n-rOhati || dEqvA vai BaqdrAH santOq&gni-mAdhi#thsanta | 7 (10)

tEShAqmanA#hitOq &gnirAsI$t | athai$ByO vAqmaM ~MvasvapA$krAmat | tE puna#rvasvOqrAda#dhata | tatOq vai tAn vAqmaM ~MvasUqpAva#rtata | yaH puqrA BaqdraH saMpApI#yAqn thsyAt | sa puna#rvasvO-raqgni-mAda#dhIta | puna#rEqvaina#M ~MvAqmaM ~MvasUqpAva#rtatE | BaqdrO Ba#vati || yaH kAqmayE#taq dAna#kAmA mE praqjAH syuqriti# | sa pUrva#yOqH Palgu#nyO-raqgni-mAda#dhIta | 8 (10)

aqryaqmNO vA EqtannakSha#tram | yatpUrvEq Palgu#nI | aqryaqmEtiq tamA#huqryO dadA#ti | dAna#kAmA asmai praqjA Ba#vanti || yaH kAqmayE#ta BaqgI syAqmiti# | sa utta#rayOqH Palgu#nyO-raqgnimAda#dhIta | Baga#syaq vA EqtannakSha#tram | yadutta#rEq Palgu#nI | BaqgyE#va Ba#vati || kAqlaqkaq~jjA vai nAmAsu#rA Asann | 9 (10)

tE su#vaqrgAya# lOqkAyAqgni-ma#cinvata | puru#Shaq iShTa#kAq-mupA#dadhAqt-puru#Shaq iShTa#kAm | sa indrO$ brAhmaqNO bruvA#Naq iShTa#kAqmupA#dhatta | EqShA mE# ciqtrA nAmEti# | tE su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamAprArO#hann | sa indraq iShTa#kAqmAvRu#hat | tE&vA#kIryanta | yE#&vAkI$ryanta | ta UrNAqvaBa#yO&Bavann | dvAvuda#patatAm | 10 (10)

tau diqvyau SvAnA#vaBavatAm | yO BrAtRu#vyavAqn thsyAt | sa ciqtrAyA#-maqgni-mAda#dhIta | aqvaqkIryaiqva BrAtRu#vyAn | OjOq bala#mindriqyaM ~MvIqrya#mAqtman-dha#ttE || vaqsantA$ brAhmaqNO$ &gnimAda#dhIta | vaqsaqntO vai brA$hmaqNasyaqrtuH | sva Eqvaina#-mRuqtAvAqdhAya# | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsI Ba#vati | muKaqM ~MvA EqtadRu#tUqnAm | 11 (10)

yad-va#saqntaH | yO vaqsantAq&gnimA#dhaqttE | muKya# Eqva Ba#vati | athOq yOni#mantamEqvainaqM prajA#taqmAdha#ttE | grIqShmE rA#jaqnya# Ada#dhIta | grIqShmO vai rA#jaqnya#syaqrtuH | sva Eqvaina#mRuqtAvAqdhAya# | iqndriqyAqvI Ba#vati | Saqradiq vaiSyaq Ada#dhIta | Saqradvai vaiSya#syaqrtuH | 12 (10)

sva Eqvaina#mRuqtAvAqdhAya# | paqSuqmAn Ba#vati || na pUrva#yOqH Palgu#nyO-raqgnimAda#dhIta | EqShA vai ja#GaqnyA# rAtri#H saM~Mvathsaqrasya# | yatpUrvEq Palgu#nI | pRuqShTiqta Eqva sa#M~MvathsaqrasyAq-gnimAqdhAya# | pApI#yAn-Bavati | utta#rayOqrAda#dhIta | EqShA vai pra#thaqmA rAtri#H saM~Mvathsaqrasya# | yadutta#rEq Palgu#nI ( ) | muqKaqta Eqva sa#M~MvathsaqrasyAq-gnimAqdhAya# | vasI#yAn Bavati || athOq Kalu# | yaqdaivaina#M ~Myaqj~ja u#paqnamE$t | athAda#dhIta | saivAsyarddhi#H || 13 (16) 1.1.3 anuvAkaM 3 - dEvayajanArthAH saMBArAH

uddha#nti | yadEqvAsyA# amEqddhyam | tadapa# hanti || aqpO&vO$kShatiq SAntyai$ || sika#tAq niva#pati | EqtadvA aqgnEr vai$SvAnaqrasya# rUqpam | rUqpENaiqva vai$SvAnaqramava#-rundhE || UShAqn niva#pati | puShTiqrvA EqShA praqjana#nam | yadUShA$H | 14 (10)

puShTyA#mEqva praqjana#nEq &gnimAdha#ttE | athO# saMqj~jAna# Eqva | saqM j~jAnaq(gg)q hyE#tat pa#SUqnAm | yadUShA$H || dyAvA#pRuthiqvI saqhAstA$m | tE vi#yaqtI a#brUtAm | astvEqva nau# saqha yaqj~jiyaqmiti# | yadaqmuShyA# yaqj~jiyaqmAsI$t | tadaqsyA-ma#dadhAt | ta UShA# aBavann | 15 (10)

yadaqsyA yaqj~jiyaqmAsI$t | tadaqmuShyA#-madadhAt | tadaqdaScaqndrama#si kRuqShNam | UShA$nniqvapa#nnaqdO ddhyA#yEt | dyAvA#pRuthiqvyOrEqva yaqj~jiyEq-&gnimAdha#ttE || aqgnirdEqvEByOq nilA#yata | AqKU rUqpaM kRuqtvA | sa pRu#thiqvIM prAvi#Sat | sa UqtIH ku#rvAqNaH pRu#thiqvImanuq sama#carat | tadA#KukarIqSha-ma#Bavat | 16 (10)

yadA#KukarIqSha(gm) sa#BAMqrO Bava#ti | yadEqvAsyaq tatraq nya#ktam | tadEqvAva#rundhE || UrjaqM ~MvA Eqta(gm) rasa#M pRuthiqvyA u#paqdIkAq uddi#hanti | yad vaqlmIka$m | yad va#lmIkavaqpA sa#BAMqrO Bava#ti | Urja#mEqva rasa#M pRuthiqvyA ava#rundhE | athOq SrOtra#mEqva | SrOtraq(gg)q hyE#tat pRu#thiqvyAH | yad vaqlmIka#H || 17 (10)

aba#dhirO Bavati | ya EqvaM ~MvEda# || praqjApa#tiH praqjA a#sRujata | tAsAqmannaq-mupA$kShIyata | tAByaqH sUdaqmupaq prABi#nat | tatOq vai tAsAqmannaqM nAkShI#yata | yasyaq sUda#H saMBAqrO Bava#ti | nAsya# gRuqhE&nna#M kShIyatE || ApOq vA iqdamagrE# saliqlamA#sIt | tEna# praqjApa#tiraSrAmyat | 18 (10)

kaqthamiqda(gg) syAqditi# | sO#&paSyat puShkarapaqrNaM tiShTha#t | sO#&manyata | astiq vai tat | yasmi#n-niqdamadhiq tiShThaqtIti# | sa va#rAqhO rUqpaM kRuqtvOpaqnya#majjat | sa pRu#thiqvImaqdha A$rcCat | tasyA# upaqhatyOda#majjat | tat pu#ShkarapaqrNE$ &prathayat | yadapra#thayat | 19 (10)

tat pRu#thiqvyai pRu#thiviqtvam | aBUqdvA iqdamiti# | tadBUmyai# BUmiqtvam | tAM diSO&nuq vAtaqH sama#vahat | tA(gm) Sarka#rABiradRu(gm) hat | SaM ~Mvai nO#&BUqditi# | tacCarka#rANA(gm) Sarkaraqtvam | yad-va#rAqhavi#hata(gm) saMBAqrO Bava#ti | aqsyAmEqvA-Ca#mbaTkAramaqgni-mAdha#ttE | Sarka#rA Bavantiq dhRutyai$ | 20 (10)

athO# SaqtvAMya# || sarE#tA aqgnirAqdhEyaq ityA#huH | ApOq varu#Nasyaq patna#ya Asann | tA aqgniraqBya#ddhyAyat | tAH sama#Bavat | tasyaq rEtaqH parA#&patat | taddhira#Nya-maBavat | yaddhira#Nya-muqpAsya#ti | sarE#tasamEqvAgni-mAdha#ttE || puru#Shaq invai svAd-rEta#sO bIBathsataq ityA#huH | 21 (10)

uqttaqraqta upA$syaqtya-bI#BathsAyai || atiq praya#cCati | Arti#mEqvAtiq praya#cCati || aqgnirdEqvEByOq nilA#yata | aSvO# rUqpaM kRuqtvA | sO$&SvaqtthE sa#M~Mvathsaqra-ma#tiShThat | tada#SvaqtthasyA$-Svatthaqtvam | yadASva#tthaH saMBAqrO Bava#ti | yadEqvAsyaq tatraq nya#ktam | tadEqvAva#-rundhE || 22 (10)

dEqvA vA UrjaqM ~Mvya#Bajanta | tata# uduqmbaraq uda#tiShThat | UrgvA u#duqmbara#H | yadaudu#mbaraH saMBAqrO Bava#ti | Urja#mEqvAva#-rundhE || tRuqtIya#syAmiqtO diqvi sOma# AsIt | taM gA#yaqtryAha#rat | tasya# paqrNama#cCidyata | tatpaqrNO# &Bavat | tat paqrNasya# parNaqtvam | 23 (10)

yasya# parNaqmaya#H saMBAqrO Bava#ti | sOqmaqpIqthamEqvAva# rundhE || dEqvA vai brahma#nnavadanta | tat paqrNa upA#SRuNOt | suqSravAq vai nAma# | yat pa#rNaqmaya#H saMBAqrO Bava#ti | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsamEqvAva# rundhE || praqjApa#ti-raqgni-ma#sRujata | sO#&biBEqtpra mA# dhakShyaqtIti# | ta(gm) SaqmyA#&Samayat | 24 (10)

tacCaqmyai# Samiqtvam | yacCa#mIqmaya#H saMBAqrO Bava#ti | SAntyAq apra#dAhAya || aqgnEH sRuqShTasya# yaqtaH | vika#~gkataqM BA A$rcCat | yad-vaika#~gkataH saMBAqrO Bava#ti | BA EqvAva#rundhE || sahRu#dayOq &gnirAqdhEyaq ityA#huH | maqrutOq&dBiraqgni-ma#tamayann | tasya# tAqntasyaq hRuda#yaqmAcCi#ndann ( ) | sA&Sani#raBavat | yadaqSani#hatasya vRuqkShasya# saMBAqrO Bava#ti | sahRu#daya-mEqvAgni-mAdha#ttE || 25 (13) (UShA# - aBavan - naBavad - vaqlmIkrO$ - &SrAmyaq - dapra#thayaq - ddhRutyai# - bIBathsataq ityA#hu - rundhE - parNaqtva - ma#Samayada - cCindaq(gg)q strINi# ca) (A3) 1.1.4 anuvAkaM 4 - saMBArasaM~MyuktAyatanEShu agnyAdhAnam

dvAqdaqSasu# vikrAqmEShvaqgnimAda#dhIta | dvAda#Saq mAsA$H saM~MvathsaqraH | saqM~MvaqthsaqrA-dEqvaina#-mavaqruddhyA-dha#ttE || yad-dvA#daqSasu# vikrAqmE-ShvAqdadhI#ta | pari#mitaqmava#rundhIta | cakShu#r nimitaq Ada#dhIta | iyaqd-dvAda#Sa vikrAqmA(3) iti# | pari#mitaM caiqvApa#rimitaqM cAva#rundhE || anRu#taqM ~Mvai vAqcA va#dati | anRu#taqM mana#sA ddhyAyati | 26 (10)

cakShuqr vai saqtyam | adrA(3)gityA#ha | ada#r.Saqmiti# | tath saqtyam | yaScakShu#r-nimitEq&gni-mA#dhaqttE | saqtya Eqvainaq-mAdha#ttE || tasmAqdAhi#tAgniqrnAnRu#taM ~MvadEt | nAsya# brAhmaqNO&nA$SvAn gRuqhE va#sEt | saqtyE hya#syAqgnirAhi#taH || AqgnEqyI vai rAtri#H | 27 (10)

AqgnEqyAH paqSava#H | aiqndramaha#H | naktaqM gAr.ha#patyaq-mAda#dhAti | paqSUnEqvAva#-rundhE | divA#&&havaqnIya$m | iqndriqyamEqvA-va#rundhE || aqrddhOdi#tEq sUrya# AhavaqnIyaq-mAda#dhAti | Eqtasmiqn vai lOqkE praqjApa#tiH praqjA a#sRujata | praqjA Eqva tad-yaja#mAnaH sRujatE | athO# BUqtaM caiqva Ba#viqShyaccA-va#rundhE || 28 (10)

iDAq vai mA#naqvI ya#j~jAnUkAqSinyA#sIt | sA&SRu#NOt | asu#rA aqgnimAda#dhataq iti# | tada#gacCat | ta A#havaqnIyaqmagraq Ada#dhata | athaq gAr.ha#patyam | athA$-nvAhAryaq-paca#nam | sA &bra#vIt | praqtIcyE#ShAq(gg)q SrIra#gAt | BaqdrA BUqtvA parA#BaviShyaqntIti# | 29 (10)

yasyaiqva-maqgnirA#dhIqyatE$ | praqtIcya#syaq SrIrE#ti | BaqdrO BUqtvA parA#Bavati || sA&SRu#NOt | dEqvA aqgni-mAda#dhataq iti# | tada#gacCat | tE$&nvAhAryaq-paca#naqmagraq Ada#dhata | athaq gAr.ha#patyam | athA#havaqnIya$m | sA&bra#vIt | 30 (10)

prAcyE#ShAq(gg)q SrIra#gAt | BaqdrA BUqtvA su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamE$Shyanti | praqjAM tu na vE$thsyantaq iti# | yasyaiqvamaqgni-rA#dhIqyatE$ | prAcya#syaq SrIrE#ti | BaqdrO BUqtvA su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamE#ti | praqjAM tu na vi#ndatE || sA&bra#vIqdiDAq manu$m | tathAq vA aqhaM tavAqgni-mAdhA$syAmi | yathAq pra praqjayA# paqSuBi#r mithuqnair ja#niqShyasE$ | 31 (10)

pratyaqsmin ~MlOqkE sthAqsyasi# | aqBi su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM jEqShyasIti# | gAr.ha#patyaqmagraq Ada#dhAt | gAr.ha#patyaqM ~MvA anu# praqjAH paqSavaqH prajA#yantE | gAr.ha#patyEnaiqvAsmai$ praqjAM paqSUn prAja#nayat | athA$-nvAhAryaq-paca#nam | tiqrya~g~g#vaq vA aqyaM ~MlOqkaH | aqsminnEqva tEna# lOqkE pratya#tiShThat | athA#havaqnIya$m | tEnaiqva su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqka-maqBya#jayat | 32 (10)

yasyaiqvamaqgni-rA#dhIqyatE$ | pra praqjayA# paqSuBi#r mithuqnair jA#yatE | pratyaqsmin ~MlOqkE ti#ShThati | aqBi su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM ja#yati || yasyaq vA aya#thAdEvatamaqgni-rA#dhIqyatE$ | A dEqvatA$ByO vRuScyatE | pApI#yAn Bavati | yasya# yathA dEvaqtam | na dEqvatA$Byaq AvRu#ScyatE | vasI#yAn Bavati ( ) | 33 (10)

BRugU#NAqM tvA&~ggi#rasAM ~MvratapatE vraqtEnA-da#dhAqmIti# BRugva~ggiqrasAqmAda#ddhyAt | AqdiqtyAnA$M tvA dEqvAnA$M ~MvratapatE vraqtEnAda#dhAqmItyaqnyAsAqM brAhma#NInAM praqjAnA$m | varu#Nasya tvAq rAj~jO$ vratapatE vraqtEnAda#dhAqmItiq rAj~ja#H | indra#sya tvEndriqyENa# vratapatE vraqtEnAda#dhAqmIti# rAjaqnya#sya | manO$stvA grAmaqNyO$ vratapatE vraqtEnAda#dhAqmItiq vaiSya#sya | RuqBUqNAM tvA# dEqvAnA$M ~MvratapatE vraqtEnAda#dhAqmIti# rathakAqrasya# | yaqthAq dEqvaqtamaqgni-rAdhI#yatE | na dEqvatA$Byaq A vRu#ScyatE | vasI#yAn Bavati || 34 (9) 1.1.5 anuvAkaM 5 - tatra pavamAnahabIMShi

praqjApa#tir vAqcaH saqtya-ma#paSyat | tEnAqgnimAdha#tta | tEnaq vai sa A$rddhnOt | BUrBuvaqH suvaqrityA#ha | Eqtadvai vAqcaH saqtyam | ya EqtEnAqgni-mA#dhaqttE | RuqddhnOtyEqva | athO# saqtyaprA#SUrEqva Ba#vati | athOq ya EqvaM ~MviqdvAna#Biqcara#ti | stRuqNuqta Eqvaina$m || 35 (10)

BUrityA#ha | praqjA Eqva tad-yaja#mAnaH sRujatE | Buvaq ityA#ha | aqsminnEqva lOqkE prati# tiShThati | suvaqrityA#ha | suqvaqrga Eqva lOqkE prati# tiShThati || triqBiraqkSharaiqr-gAr.ha#patyaq-mAda#dhAti | traya# iqmE lOqkAH | EqShvE#vaina#M ~MlOqkEShuq prati#ShThitaq-mAdha#ttE | sarvai$H paq~jcaBi#-rAhavaqnIya$m | 36 (10)

suqvaqrgAyaq vA EqSha lOqkAyAdhI#yatE | yadA#havaqnIya#H | suqvaqrga EqvAsmai# lOqkE vAqcaH saqtya(gm) sarva#mApnOti || triqBir gAr.ha#patyaq-mAda#dhAti | paq~jcaBi#-rAhavaqnIya$m | aqShTau saMpa#dyantE | aqShTAkSha#rA gAyaqtrI | gAqyaqtrO$&gniH | yAvA#nEqvAgniH | tamAdha#ttE || 37 (10)
